head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LAURITA, RICHARD A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LAURITA, RICHARD A.

block.p: LAURITA--Richard A. The members and employees of Geller Group, LLC, a member of Focus Financial Partners, wish to express their sorrow at the loss of Rich Laurita. We are deeply saddened by the passing of Rich, a giving, caring and fun loving colleague. We extend our sincerest condolences to his wife, Krista, to his sister, Monica, and to his parents, Sharon and Tony.
